name: Astrid
body:
### About
This is a fork of Todoroo's Astrid and is in no way associated with Yahoo! or Todoroo. You can install Astrid by visiting the [Google Play Store](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.astrid)

### Get Involved
I intend on continuing development of Astrid and could use your help!
- Join the [astrid-betas](https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/astrid-betas) google group and [opt-in](https://play.google.com/apps/testing/org.astrid) to receive beta versions from the Google Play Store.
- Install [Android Studio](http://developer.android.com/sdk/installing/studio.html), fork the repository, and help me squash bugs, refactor the codebase, update translations, or add new features. 
- [File bug reports](https://github.com/abaker/astrid/issues)

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Astrid? Report an [issue](https://github.com/abaker/astrid/issues) or contact @abaker
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
